item.title: Eurizon 的任志强称中国股市可能出现 "严重反弹
item.description: Eurizon SLJ Capital 的 Stephen Jen 认为，中国股市和人民币在近期刺激政策的推动下上涨，中国债券也在下跌，投资者应该延续这种涨势。【原文：Investors should extend the recent stimulus-fuelled gains in Chinese equities and the yuan as well as the decline in the country’s bonds, according to Stephen Jen of Eurizon SLJ Capital.】

item.title: 瑞银主席告诉报纸他低估了对埃尔莫蒂薪酬的反应
item.description: 瑞银集团董事长科尔姆-凯莱赫（Colm Kelleher）表示，他低估了公众对首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）2023 年 1440 万瑞士法郎（1710 万美元）薪酬方案的负面反应。【原文：UBS Group AG Chairman Colm Kelleher said he had underestimated the negative public response to Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti’s 14.4 million Swiss franc ($17.1 million) pay package in 2023.】

item.title: 尼欧莱博中国部门将从母公司和投资者处获得 19 亿美元投资
item.description: 尼欧控股有限公司是电动汽车制造商尼欧公司在中国的子公司，将从母公司和一批战略投资者那里获得 133 亿元人民币（19 亿美元）的投资。【原文：Nio Holding Co., a China-based subsidiary of electric vehicle maker Nio Inc., will receive 13.3 billion yuan ($1.9 billion) of investment from the parent and a group of strategic investors.】

item.title: 世界上最大的核研究中心迎来 70 周岁生日，它在寻找为下一件大事提供资金的途径
item.description: 欧洲核子研究中心（CERN）是一个研究宇宙最小构件的粒子物理实验室，它正面临着一个新的挑战：如何为一个耗资 170 亿美元的项目提供资金，使其在竞争中保持领先地位。【原文：CERN, the particle physics lab researching the smallest building blocks of the universe, is facing a new challenge: how to fund a $17 billion project to keep it ahead of the competition.】

item.title: 极右翼自由党将赢得奥地利投票：看点
item.description: 据预测，奥地利极右翼政党自由党将首次在联邦选举中赢得最多选票，这将是该国两大历史性政治团体的惨败，很可能预示着一段复杂的联合谈判。【原文：Austria’s far-right Freedom Party is forecast to win the most votes at a federal election for the first time, in what would be a bitter defeat for the nation’s two historical political groups that will likely herald a complicated stretch of coalition talks.】

item.title: 风暴克拉洪向菲律宾袭来，有可能形成超强台风
item.description: 热带风暴克拉洪正在向菲律宾袭来，当局已将吕宋岛北部地区列入警戒状态，称其迅速加强的可能性很大，并有可能成为超强台风。【原文：Tropical storm Krathon is headed for the Philippines as authorities place northern parts of the main Luzon island on alert, saying there’s a high chance of rapid intensification and the possibility it could become a super typhoon.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话和就业数据有助于明确美联储加息路径
item.description: 未来一周，随着杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向经济学家发表讲话以及政府公布新的就业数据，美联储政策制定者在 11 月份再次大幅降息的意愿可能会更加引人注目。【原文：The appetite of Federal Reserve policymakers for another large interest-rate cut in November may come into better focus in the coming week as Jerome Powell addresses economists and the government issues new employment numbers.】

item.title: 风险最高的房地产债券回报率超过了英伟达
item.description: 以前债务世界的一个阴暗角落，如今已成为全球金融市场上最大的赢家，其回报率是十多年来很少有交易商能看到的。【原文：A previously gloomy corner of the debt world has become the biggest winning trade in global financial markets, producing returns that few traders have seen in more than a decade.】

item.title: 路透社称 TPG 正牵头收购创意策划公司股份
item.description: 路透社援引未具名知情人士的话报道称，收购公司 TPG 是收购 Creative Planning 少数股权的领跑者，该收购将使这家财富管理公司的估值超过 150 亿美元。【原文：Buyout firm TPG is the frontrunner to acquire a minority stake in Creative Planning that would value the wealth management firm at more than $15 billion, Reuters reported, citing unidentified people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 天空新闻》称凯雷已就泰晤士河水务投资事宜进行接洽
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周六报道，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）已就投资泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的可能性进行了接洽。【原文：Carlyle Group has been approached about a potential investment in Thames Water, Sky News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 波兰计划从 2025 年起发行兹罗提、欧元和美元债券
item.description: 波兰政府在其 2025 年至 2028 年债务管理战略中表示，波兰计划在未来几年发行兹罗提债券以及欧元和美元债务。【原文：Poland plans to issue zloty-denominated bonds as well as euro and dollar debt in the coming years, the government said in its debt management strategy for 2025 through 2028.】

item.title: 银行业是时候保持谨慎了华尔街周刊
item.description: 欢迎收看《华尔街一周》时事通讯，我们将为您讲述资本主义的故事，您需要知道的事情，但您更需要思考的事情。我是大卫-威斯汀（David Westin），本周我们将讲述宠物医疗保健这一庞大且不断增长的行业的故事，前往匹兹堡讲述一家大型地区性银行 PNC 的故事，并探讨为什么这一代人比他们的父辈更难做得更好。 如果您还不是订阅者，请在此注册订阅本新闻通讯。【原文：Welcome to the Wall Street Week newsletter, bringing you stories of capitalism about things you need to know, but even more things you need to think about. I'm David Westin, and this week we told the story of the large and growing business of pet health care, traveled to Pittsburgh for the story of a major regional bank, PNC, and looked at why this generation is having a harder time doing better than their parents did. If you're not yet a subscriber, sign up here for this newsletter.】

item.title: 印度放宽对非巴斯马蒂白米的出口限制
item.description: 印度放松了对部分大米出口的限制，此举可能会缓解全球大米价格，并预示着近期全国大选后国内农业政策的转变。【原文：India loosened restrictions on some rice exports, a move that may ease global prices and signal a shift in domestic agricultural policies following recent national elections.】

item.title: 共同社称加藤将成为日本新任财务大臣
item.description: 据共同社报道，加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）将接替铃木淳一（Shunichi Suzuki）成为日本下一任财政大臣，在经济变革时期领导日本财政。【原文：Katsunobu Kato is set to become Japan’s next finance minister, according to Kyodo News, replacing Shunichi Suzuki to take on the job of steering the country’s finances through a period of economic change.】

item.title: 尼泊尔洪水和山体滑坡造成数十人死亡和失踪
item.description: 尼泊尔加德满都（美联社）— 尼泊尔官员周六表示，连续降雨引发的洪水和山体滑坡已造成至少66人死亡，另有69人失踪。【原文：KATHMANDU, Nepal (AP) — Flooding and landslides caused by continuous rainfall has killed at least 66 people in Nepal, and a further 69 are missing, officials said Saturday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯空袭造成苏梅六人死亡，乌克兰坚守武赫勒达尔
item.description: 乌克兰内政部长伊霍尔-克里缅科（Ihor Klymenko）在 Telegram 上说，俄罗斯空袭袭击了乌克兰北部城市苏梅的一家医疗诊所，造成至少六人死亡，数人受伤。【原文：At least six people were killed and several were wounded after Russian airstrikes hit a medical clinic in Ukraine’s northern city of Sumy, Interior Minister Ihor Klymenko said on Telegram.】

item.title: 高盛、贝莱德警告欧洲股市反弹面临艰难险阻
item.description: 欧洲股市在本周再创新高后，要延续 2024 年的涨势还面临一系列障碍。【原文：European stocks face a series of hurdles to extend their 2024 rally after hitting another record high this week.】

item.title: 土耳其引入 10%最低企业税以减少预算缺口
item.description: 土耳其将从 2025 年起对公司征收 10%的最低企业税，以帮助缩小预算赤字。【原文：Turkey will introduce a 10% minimum corporate tax for companies starting from 2025 to help narrow its budget deficit.】

item.title: 阿达尼在肯尼亚的交易引发抗议、诉讼和听证会
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）经营肯尼亚主要机场的提议引发了抗议、参议院听证会和针对这位亚洲第二富豪控制的集团的诉讼，尽管该集团已将在东非国家建设高压输电线路的交易收入囊中。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s proposal to run Kenya’s main airport has sparked protests, Senate hearings and lawsuits against the group controlled by Asia’s second-richest man, even as it bags a deal to construct high-voltage power transmission lines in the East African nation.】

item.title: 温哥华港口谷物工人达成结束罢工的临时协议
item.description: 温哥华谷物码头工人最快将于周六上午返回工作岗位，结束加拿大最繁忙港口在收获季节的罢工。【原文：Vancouver grain terminal workers will return to work as soon as Saturday morning, ending a walkout at Canada’s busiest port at the height of harvest season.】

item.title: 黎智英的香港律师称他可获得医疗服务
item.description: 本月早些时候，前香港媒体大亨黎智英（Jimmy Lai）向联合国发出呼吁，随后他的律师发表声明称，黎智英在狱中可以获得医疗、日光浴和定期锻炼。【原文：Imprisoned former Hong Kong media mogul Jimmy Lai has access to medical treatment, daylight and regular exercise, according to a statement from his lawyers that followed an appeal to the UN earlier this month.】

item.title: 墨西哥国会将在辛鲍姆上任第一周就能源改革展开辩论
item.description: 墨西哥下议院执政党莫雷纳党领导人里卡多-蒙雷亚尔（Ricardo Monreal）在其 X 账户上发布的一段视频中称，墨西哥下议院计划在下周克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）执政的头几天讨论安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）总统提出的能源改革方案。【原文：Mexico’s Lower House plans to spend the first few days of Claudia Sheinbaum’s administration next week discussing an energy reform proposed by President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador, according to remarks by Ricardo Monreal, leader of the ruling Morena party in the chamber, in a video posted on his X account.】

item.title: 路透社称马里军政府逮捕四名巴里克黄金公司员工
item.description: 据路透社周五报道，军方领导的马里当局逮捕了加拿大矿业公司巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：The military-led authorities in Mali have arrested four employees of Canadian mining company Barrick Gold Corp., Reuters reported Friday, citing two people it didn’t identify.】

item.title: 交易员忽视更深层次的问题，中国股市欣喜若狂
item.description: 中国股市的牛市已经被烧毁过很多次，但目前的这波亢奋是如此强烈，以至于他们把谨慎抛到了九霄云外。【原文：Chinese stock bulls have been burnt many times before but the current wave of euphoria is so strong that they’re throwing caution to the wind.】

item.title: 巴西法院裁定马斯克必须支付 190 万美元才能解除对 X 的禁令
item.description: 根据巴西最高法院周五提交的一份文件，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）将不得不额外支付 1030 万雷亚尔（约合 190 万美元），以恢复社交媒体平台 X 在巴西的业务。【原文：Elon Musk will have to pay an additional 10.3 million reais ($1.9 million) to reinstate social media platform X in Brazil, according to a Supreme Court filing Friday.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特的美国银行抛售狂潮接近关键里程碑
item.description: 经过十几轮抛售，沃伦-巴菲特在美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：A dozen rounds of selling have trimmed Warren Buffett’s stake in Bank of America Corp. to the cusp of a key regulatory threshold, in which he will no longer need to quickly notify the public of his trading.】

item.title: 前墨西哥城官员接替约里奥出任财政部部长
item.description: 据熟悉内情的政府官员透露，一名前墨西哥城官员准备接替财政部副部长加布里埃尔-约里奥（Gabriel Yorio）。【原文：A former Mexico City official is poised to replace Deputy Finance Minister Gabriel Yorio, according to government officials familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局准备为受困的波音宇航员执行救援任务
item.description: 美国太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）准备向国际空间站发射一个双人乘员组，这是美国国家航空航天局（NASA）两名宇航员乘坐波音公司的 "星际客机"（Starliner）飞船返回太空站任务的开始。【原文：SpaceX is poised to launch a two-person crew to the International Space Station, the start of a mission to bring home two NASA astronauts stuck in orbit after flying on Boeing Co.’s Starliner spacecraft.】

item.title: 谷歌为广告技术安全辩护，称可与 Meta、亚马逊匹敌
item.description: 谷歌公司本周在联邦法院反驳司法部对其非法垄断的指控，称谷歌的技术为广告商和出版商提供了一个安全的生态系统，使他们能在竞争激烈的网络广告世界中利用各种工具进行交易。【原文：Google’s technologies offer advertisers and publishers a safe ecosystem of tools to transact amid the intensely competitive world of online advertising, the company argued in federal court this week to counter Justice Department allegations that it is an illegal monopoly.】

item.title: 波音法官下令就受害者家属反对的认罪协议举行听证会
item.description: 得克萨斯州的一名联邦法官下令在 10 月份举行听证会，让美国司法部为其与波音公司就两起致命的 737 Max 飞机坠毁事件达成的刑事认罪协议进行辩护；这一协议遭到了遇难者家属的反对。【原文：A federal judge in Texas ordered a hearing in October for the US Department of Justice to defend its criminal plea agreement with Boeing Co. over two fatal 737 Max plan crashes — a deal opposed by families of the victims.】
